Contributor: Osnis, Benedict A., 1872-1941, artist.; Erie Litho & Ptg. Co., publisher, lithographer, printer.;
Note: Signed "B.A. Osnis." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: The text adds: "Humanit calls", and lists participating organizations, such as the Red Cross, Salvation Army, and the Boy Scouts. Illustration shows a war chest with money in it.  Many different war scenes are portrayed.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Erie, Pa. : Erie Litho & Ptg. Co.,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Fund raising -- United States.; Charities -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: Help fill the war chest
